channel.title: React on Tanmay Chakrabarty
channel.description: Recent content in React on Tanmay Chakrabarty

item.title: Capital Asset Pricing Model
item.description: The CAPM Financial Analysis project is a Python-based implementation of the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM). This model is widely used in finance to estimate the expected return on an investment by taking into account the risk-free rate, the market risk premium, and the asset’s beta. The project provides functionalities to calculate the expected returns for a given set of securities based on the CAPM formula. The application uses libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Streamlit and Plotly, to gather stock data from Yahoo Finance and perform calculations to determine expected returns.

item.title: Take a Note
item.description: Take a Note is a simple React.js based Note taking webapp that lets the user Add Notes and Search inside the notes. Dark mode support. Don’t worry about closing the browser tab since the notes get saved to local storage.

item.title: Press B
item.description: Press B is an E-commerce website made with React.js, Commerce JS API, Stripe API & Material UI. The site displays a catalogue of products where the user can add or remove items to his/her Shopping Cart. The Cart can be viewed anytime to view the items and subtotal of the cost. Additionally, the Cart can be emptied entirely, or individual items can be removed. On checkout, the address and credit card details are asked for (validation of Card details entered is also done) and when the user proceeds ahead the buying journey is concluded with the message “Thank You for Shopping with Us”.
